item.description: All sorts of performances are welcome (~10 minutes max), as well as audience members! Come enjoy a free night of entertainment in a spacious room. There's plenty of parking along the right side of Village Ct, drive all the way up to the circle turnaround or park behind the line of cars! http://sawyerhill.org... http://sawyerhill.org... ; (use 46 Sawyer Hill Rd for gps directions)

group.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons & Camelot Cohousing

item.name: Open Mic night in Camelot Cohousing
